Investor_8.name: Nadia Novak
Investor_8.content: As an investor, I have exhibited a strong commitment to maximizing my returns while ensuring clear communication and understanding throughout the investment process. My active engagement with the allocation plan and my diligence in upholding profit-sharing agreements reflect my reliability and astuteness in investment activities. This experience has reinforced my reputation as an effective investor who prioritizes secure and favorable outcomes in transactions.

Trustee_14.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Trustee_14.content: The trustee, Juan Carlos Reyes, proposed an initially equitable allocation plan but ultimately failed to adhere fully to the agreed terms during the profit distribution. The misalignment between the expected and actual returns raised significant concerns regarding his trustworthiness and integrity. While the distribution was technically balanced, the lack of transparency and fairness has negatively impacted his reputation, marking him as unreliable in the eyes of investors.

Trustee_12.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12.content: Due to credible concerns about significant allocation discrepancies and lack of communication, Akiko Sato's reputation has diminished. Trustworthiness and pro-sociality are now questioned, impacting her standing in the community.

Trustee_3.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3.content: Maria Rossi has demonstrated exceptional integrity and transparency during the investment process. She made adjustments to the profit allocation that benefitted me, showcasing her commitment to fairness and trustworthiness. By exceeding expectations with unexpected returns, Maria has fostered a strong, positive relationship rooted in cooperation and reliability, establishing her reputation as a credible trustee for future investments.
